item.title: BlackBerry Shows its Curve in Pink
item.description:
Who says productivity can’t be stylish? Why not combine technology and beauty in the business world? It’s definitely possible! The BlackBerry Curve 8330 Pink for Verizon Wireless is a perfect example. This device deserves a spot in a movie, maybe titled “Pretty in Pink”â€”although that title is already taken, it perfectly captures the essence of this phone. This classic BlackBerry delivers on productivity while boasting an elegant curved design and a lovely pink exterior...
